;In the last few seasons, Barcelona have been winning in this rivalry. In 2011 they won the La Liga title and also the UEFA Champions League title, so that they are supreme in this rivalry for another year. Barcelona needed to beat Real Madrid to win both of these titles. In the past 80 years Barcelona and Real Madrid have alternated in title matches with one team winning a title match then the other team winning the following year. This has been going on since 1929 when the Spanish began playing football. Both teams have dominated the La Liga competition. The even have control of the Copa Del Ray, a yearly game in the Spanish League featuring the two top teams. Forty-three Copa Del Rey titles have been won between Barcelona and Real Madrid.
